page.title: 10My Club-Swimming
page.content: In the summer Sports Roundabout at Lacon Childe includes an outdoor swimming club. It is on Tuesdays and Thursdays. I usually go on Tuesdays. It is forty pence to get in. You can either go from six till seven or seven till eight. There are usually a lot of children there and I go from six until seven. I go swimming with the school as well. It's my favourite sport. I'm not exactly brilliant but I enjoy it very much. At swimming I practise diving and swimming lengths. I do cartwheels off the diving board into the water. I can pick the brick up from the deep end but sometimes I don't manage to pick it up. I look forward to the summer which is the only time we can use our open-air pool. The pool was provided by public subscription about twenty years ago.
